Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>「雲海にそびえし古の塔」<White>…… そこに次の聖獣が……次こそは……
Entry.EnglishText: "<Cyan>The ancient tower which soars above a sea of clouds<White>..." That's where the next Sacred Beast is... Surely this time...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ハックなら何か知っているかもしれん。 ひとまずピピスタへ戻ろう。
Entry.EnglishText: Hack might know something about it. Let's go back to Pipista for now.
